docs.text: Harshin Kamal Asok PhD Student | Urban Heat Island | CFD | Green Infrastructure Department of Civil & Environmental Engineering Florida International University (FIU) 🔍 About Me I am a researcher working on Urban Heat Island (UHI) mitigation, Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), microclimate modeling, and green infrastructure . My work combines numerical modeling, field data, and machine learning to study the impact of trees, buildings, and materials on urban climate. 🌱 Research Interests Urban Heat Island & Microclimate CFD (OpenFOAM) simulations of tree canopy flow Solar radiation, sky view factor, and energy balance Green stormwater infrastructure and urban cooling Machine learning for environmental prediction 📁 Website Sections Section Description Research Current and past research projects Publications Journal papers and conference presentations Softwares Codes, datasets, and OpenFOAM tools Contact Email and professional links Thank you for visiting my homepage!

docs.title: Harshin Kamal Asok

docs.text: I am a researcher working on Urban Heat Island (UHI) mitigation, Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), microclimate modeling, and green infrastructure . My work combines numerical modeling, field data, and machine learning to study the impact of trees, buildings, and materials on urban climate.

docs.text: Softwares & Tools 🧊 OpenFOAM Models Customized fvDOM radiation model with Sky View Factor. Tree canopy modeling using porous media and ghost-cell approach . 🛠️ Python / MATLAB Tools Automated processing of HOBO environmental sensor data. Scripts for visualization of CFD temperature, velocity, and radiation data. 📂 Repository Plans ⚙️ urban-cfd-toolkit/ ⚙️ tree-canopy-data-processing/ ⚙️ uhi-ml-prediction/ You can access my GitHub profile here: 👉 https://github.com/hkasok

docs.title: 📝 Manuscripts in Preparation

docs.text: Research 🌳 Urban Tree Canopy & Microclimate Modeling CFD simulations using OpenFOAM to analyze airflow and temperature around trees. Evaluating cooling effects of different tree species, canopy density, and arrangement. ☀ Solar Radiation & Sky View Factor (SVF) Integrated SVF and solar radiation models into CFD for realistic thermal environments. Investigating shading patterns and thermal comfort in tropical urban areas. 💧 Green Stormwater Infrastructure & UHI Studying how bioswales, permeable pavements, and vegetation control surface temperature. Linking water balance, heat storage, and evaporation in urban hydrology models. 🤖 Machine Learning for UHI Prediction Developing ML models using CFD output, satellite LST, land cover, and DEM data . Exploring physics-informed neural networks to improve prediction accuracy. More details and project files will be added soon.
